name: VACIA
description:
Vacía is a little short game emerged form a class project. The main character, Vacía, is another illustration class project by Xoanonn. 

The game is based in two levels. In the first one, it will be necessary to clean the seabed. In the second one, the goal is to reforest an island.

This is my first 3D game and I accept all kinds of advice and recommendations on this title or on development in general.
